Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
